title: Lynda - 3D Typography in After Effects
description:
Lynda - 3D Typography in After Effects

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

5h 10m Intermediate Jul 17, 2014 | Uploaded in Dec 1, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Video 
Software: After Effects Element 3D BorisFX Power Animator ShapeShifter AE 
Author: Eran Stern 
 
There are many options for creating 3D text in After Effects, including After Effects' own ray-traced 3D feature, third-party plugins, scripts, and now CINEMA 4D Lite. But which one is best for you?â€¨â€¨In this course, motion graphics veteran Eran Stern discusses the options and their pros and cons. He'll also compare 2D and 3D typography, and discuss techniques to ensure your work looks great and your message is clear. Plus, learn about tools that behave like subsoftware inside After Effects, allowing you to create stunning 3D text faster than ever before. From built-in tools to advanced third-party plugins, such as Element 3D, BCC Units, and Invigorator Pro, this is your chance to find out which one suits your needs and budget.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Why good typography matters in motion graphics
	â€¢	Creating faux 3D and pseudodepth
	â€¢	Using the ray-traced 3D renderer
	â€¢	Extruding text in C4D Lite
	â€¢	Working with BCC Units 3D Objects, Invigorator Pro, and Element 3D
